title: The Original Highlights of Lima - Private Half Day Tour
description: Experience the highlights of Lima on a private tour of colorful neighborhoods, historic sites, and the Inka Market. Peru’s biggest city can be overwhelming for first-time visitors, but touring Lima with a private guide is a great way to get oriented, covering more ground than you could on your own. Extend your visit with a trip to Kennedy Park (Parque Kennedy), including a stop to purchase lunch at La Lucha Sangucheria Criolla.
all_descriptions: Experience the highlights of Lima on a private tour of colorful neighborhoods, historic sites, and the Inka Market. Peru’s biggest city can be overwhelming for first-time visitors, but touring Lima with a private guide is a great way to get oriented, covering more ground than you could on your own. Extend your visit with a trip to Kennedy Park (Parque Kennedy), including a stop to purchase lunch at La Lucha Sangucheria Criolla.

Meet a driver at your hotel and then set out for Lima’s colonial-era city center. Walk through traditional plazas and historic streets, and visit a series of architectural highlights, including the San Francisco Convent—a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

Next, head to the coastal Miraflores neighborhood, stopping by Huaca Pucllana, a pre-Incan pyramid surrounded by modern homes, on the way to the Inka Market. Get tips on picking up the best handicrafts and souvenirs before continuing to the Park of Love and some great views of the beach.

Finally, drive to the top of Morro Solar for sweeping views of Chorrillos Bay, the city, and shantytowns, and learn about Lima’s persistent cultural divisions. If you’re adding the optional extension, visit Kennedy Park’s huge population of local cats and then pause at a beloved sandwich spot to purchase a classic Lima lunch before returning to your original departure point.

Perfect tour of Lima

My wife brother and I had an 8 hour layover in Lima heading home from Cusco. We booked the 5 hour highlights of Lima tour and couldn’t have been happier. Nathaly was absolutely terrific. She (and our driver Jorge) met us at the airport and showed us the different neighborhoods and historical sights. Nathaly’s English is outstanding and she was thoroughly knowledgeable and engaging. Outstanding tour!!

The most comprehensive tour of Lima to date. Hugely educational yet engaging. 10/10

Aug 2025
We’ve joined many a private tour in various countries and this one stands out as one of the best. We did our research and at the time of writing no other tour company provided such a comprehensive tour of Lima. We had the wonderful Nathaly who charmed us with her passionate knowledge and love for Lima. Her fluency in English was so good we were amazed it was her second language. She was truly exceptional. The 8hrs private tour was a joy and it simply flew by. Don’t miss out on lunch at the Larco museum. It isn’t just a beautiful restaurant set in the historic grounds of the museum, it also serves superb Peruvian classics. Nathaly introduced every dish.
Written August 8, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

She is truly an amazing guide and leads our Best of Lima tour seamlessly every time. Thank you so much for your review of the best tour out there, we appreciate it!! Kindest regards to you both, it was our pleasure showing you around Lima for the day.

The Perfect First Day in Lima – Mily Made It Unforgettable!

This was my first time in Lima, and I truly couldn’t have asked for a better way to experience the city than with Mily & George’s private tour. From the moment we met Mily, I knew we were in great hands. She’s warm, incredibly knowledgeable, and so passionate about her city — the perfect guide for a first-time visitor!

Our tour was flawlessly organized from start to finish. Mily created a thoughtful, customized itinerary that gave us a little bit of everything: rich history, vibrant neighborhoods, delicious local food, and even a few hidden gems that we never would have found on our own. It was the perfect introduction to Lima and set the tone for the rest of our trip.

What impressed me most was how seamless everything felt. Mily took care of every detail, allowing us to relax and enjoy the experience. She made us feel welcomed, informed, and completely immersed in the culture from the very beginning.

If you’re visiting Lima — especially for the first time — I can’t recommend Mily & George enough. This was more than just a tour; it was the best possible way to start our adventure in Peru. Thank you, Mily, for an unforgettable first day!
Written May 22, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Great Tour if you’re 1 day in Lima

We had a Great Tour, just as we had hoped for.
Lima is really not a city you can explore by yourself (without a car). So this was the ideal way to see everything within one day.

With Lourdes we had a great guide, she was very knowledgeable! We liked the mix of sights and how perfectly timed the transfers were.

We would definitely recommend this tour, especially if you only have a short time in Lima

Integrity Tourism
Once again, our Highlights tour lives up to its name! We are so glad that you enjoyed the itinerary and your guide Lourdes. We try to be as efficient as possible know the obstacles that exist in Lima when it comes to traffic. For this reason, this hand-picked itinerary is perfect for those short on time. You are also right in that it would be very hard to do such a tour on your own, even if you had a car. Our drivers have tried and true routes that help us deliver a seamless itinerary in such a short time! Best wishes to you both!
